title: 2009 Clarkesworld Reader's Poll
author: Neil Clarke
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: 2009 Clarkesworld Reader's Poll
text:
Editorial
 2009 Reader's Poll
 Every year, we give you the opportunity to pick your Clarkesworld favorites from the prior year. This time around, we are focusing on your favorite fiction and cover art from 2009 (listed below).
 Everyone that participates will be in the running for one of five free copies of UNPLUGGED: THE WEB'S BEST SCI-FI & FANTASY: 2008 DOWNLOAD, a new trade paperback from Wyrm Publishing.
 We will close this survey on January 30th and publish the results in our next issue.

 Teaching Bigfoot to Read by Geoffrey W. Cole

 2009 Cover Art
 Neil Clarke is the editor of Clarkesworld Magazine and Forever Magazine; owner of Wyrm Publishing; and a ten-time Hugo Award Nominee for Best Editor (short form). His anthologies include Upgraded, Galactic Empires, More Human Than Human, Touchable Unreality, The Final Frontier, Not One of Us, The Eagle has Landed, and the Best Science Fiction of the Years series. His latest anthology, The Best Science Fiction of the Year: Volume 6, is now available from Night Shade Books. He currently lives in NJ with his wife and two sons.
